text_block_list.text: After the Twinkle Series settled down for a while, one day some time later.
I ended up going on the promised hot spring trip with Matikanetannhauser.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ryokan inn, ryokan inn~♪

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Oh, Trainer, want some snacks?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Candy, chocolate, gum... I bought all sorts of things within 300 yen!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Well, because travel snacks have to be within 300 yen, right!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Like filling the last 10 yen with small gum or something, so yeah! This is the fruit of my efforts!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: So, take whatever you like! Hehehe.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Oh, and! Actually, I brought playing cards too! We absolutely have to play later, okay!
Feeling quite nostalgic, we swayed on the train for a while...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...!? It's about five times more luxurious than the place I went to on a school trip back in the day!?
We safely arrived at the inn.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hmm... dinner is from 6 PM, right? So that means... hmm, free time, I guess?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: So, like checking out souvenir shops, going to tourist spots...? Hmm.
choice_data_list: Since we're here, why not try the hot spring first?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Oh, right. Bath time isn't set, after all!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hmm, then... let's go ahead and do it!
During the bath...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ahh~, so relaxing and refreshing, bam-ba-ba!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Fwaa~...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Mm... Yeah, maybe because I took a bath~.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Ah, but it's okay!
Since we came all this way, we have to go see lots of things!
choice_data_list: A nap would be fine too

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Huh, really?
Oh, I see... It's okay to sleep.
choice_data_list: We came here to relax in the first place

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
I see. Somehow, when I think of trips,
I have a strong image of everyone wandering around.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
But with just the two of us, it's fine.
Hehe, this trip feels so free...

Perhaps she was too excited,
Matikanetannhauser didn't wake up until the sun went down.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Whoa! I overslept!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Oh no, tourist spots and stuff are closed by now, right!?
Aww, I messed up.
choice_data_list: On the contrary, it was good we could take it easy

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Trainer...
Thank you...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: But, since we're here, I wish we could have made some kind of memory.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
...Ah! That's right.
Wasn't there a sea nearby?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Since we're here,
why don't we go see it for a little bit?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Wow... It's beautiful!
Even at night, you can see it so clearly!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
The breeze feels nice too.
I'm glad we came to see it...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
...Ehehe.
This hot spring trip is fun.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
You know, actually, last night,
I was preparing with the same feeling as when we went on a school trip back in school.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Buying snacks, packing cards,
thinking we'd go around lots of tourist spots.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
...And because of that, I got too excited
and couldn't sleep much last night. Ahaha...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: But, a trip with just you, Trainer, is a little different from the school ones, huh.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
It's free, fun, relaxed,
with the usual ordinary atmosphere, but—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Sometimes, just a little bit, it's special, isn't it?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
The inn's nap, this night sea...
It all feels like a secret just between the two of us.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
...Hehe, just kidding.
I said something weird.
Matikanetannhauser watched the ebb and flow of the water's surface and smiled quietly.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
...Let's go on a trip together again, okay?
Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Fuh-he, yay!
An irreplaceable bond formed between you and Matikanetannhauser—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ah, we missed dinner time!

Even with all that happened,
it was a fleeting moment felt...
